SqlDefinition.SqlCommand: SELECT IFNULL(m.`Name`,m.`Account`) AS User_Name,a.`CreationUser`,a.`ID` AS `uuid`,a.`ProductCode`,a.`QuestionType`,a.`QuestionDescribe`,a.`AftermarketStatus`,UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.CreationDate) AS CreationDateTicks,DATE_FORMAT(a.CreationDate,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CreationDate FROM TB_MB_Aftermarket a JOIN `TB_MB_MemberInfo` AS m ON a.`User_ID`=m.`ID` WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.AftermarketStatus=@@AftermarketStatus@@ %> <%= AND a.ProductCode like @@ProductCode@@ %> ORDER BY a.ID DESC <%= LIMIT @@StartSize@@ , @@PageSize@@%>; SELECT count(0) AS total FROM TB_MB_Aftermarket a WHERE a.`Status`=TRUE <%= AND a.AftermarketStatus=@@AftermarketStatus@@ %> <%= AND a.ProductCode like @@ProductCode@@ %>;
